_header: Jesu that of this earth madest me
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: Prayers for ‘Mercy’ and ‘Thankyng’ following Richard of Caister’s Metrical Prayer (2869) — two 6-line stanzas, monorhyming

BodLatLitE47.First Lines:
Ihesu þat of þis erthe madyst meHaue mercy and pety on
                    me…
BodLatLitE47.Last Lines:
…Ihesu for the demyng of meWyth alle my wyttys I drede
                    the
